document.full_text: shares of exelixis inc fell 20 percent on monday after the company reported data over the weekend showing that its experimental cancer drug caused the deaths of six patients in a clinical trial.
document.title: exelixis shares fall on cancer drug safety concerns
lines_and_colors: shares of exelixis inc fell 20 percent on monday after the company reported data over the weekend showing that its experimental cancer drug caused the deaths of six patients in a clinical trial.
